channel.title: All American Pk (best summoning around on a 317)
channel.description:
ok, ive been working on summoning for about 1 day, and here's the stages i went through:
from: [IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj40/Gh0stJr/AAPK0009-1.png[/img]
to: [IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj40/Gh0stJr/AAPK0010-1.png[/img]
to: [IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj40/Gh0stJr/AAPK0012.png[/img]
and the vids: first - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nZoKSqeZ9XA
second - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UqVSSm2C-wU
final and best - uploading
and my custom welcome screen: :] [IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj40/Gh0stJr/AAPK0011-1.png[/img]
ill upload more pics tomorrow.

item.title: All American Pk (best summoning around on a 317)
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

[quote=“joeyjoe9876, post:22, topic:259962”][quote author=Teh Moose link=topic=343252.msg2665428#msg2665428 date=1234507758]

I haven’t seen one tutorial on interfaces yet. If they’re so easy why don’t you post a tut on them? I would really like to make custom interfaces myself and think he did a great job!
[/quote]

Thanks joey

there is a tutorial on making/adding custom interfaces; maybe you should look in the client hacking section[/quote]

I haven’t seen one tutorial on interfaces yet. If they’re so easy why don’t you post a tut on them? I would really like to make custom interfaces myself and think he did a great job!

item.title: All American Pk (best summoning around on a 317)
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

[quote=“I PK Pigeons, post:13, topic:259962”][quote author=Gh0st Jr link=topic=343252.msg2652357#msg2652357 date=1233606107]
100% real boys. i didnt NOTHING to the pics/vids, i got another vid ill put on showing u that they do work, and why? do u guys think it is to good to be true?
[/quote]

Interfaces are easy to do to be honest… essentially you’re just loading sprites.
But they look horribly done.
Don’t use paint in the future… Use the actual sprites which Jagex did…[/quote]

I haven’t seen one tutorial on interfaces yet. If they’re so easy why don’t you post a tut on them? I would really like to make custom interfaces myself and think he did a great job!

Read full topic

item.title: All American Pk (best summoning around on a 317)
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

I am thinking he logged in and painted that welcome screen with a black fill bucket. There are still green bits. It looks messy. The summoning SideBar looks painted in. The special attack. The background area, the text, looks like it was stolen, looks like you just logged in from RuneScape took the wolf, the back of the wolf on the first image still has black in the middle of the legs. It looks like you have just used a block-drag over the inventory spots, as it is also taking over the Game Frame.

Read full topic
